getName().Description: Retrieves the name of this event.

Returns: The player associated with this event.
getPlayer().Description: Retrieves the player information associated with this event. Note that this object is a volatile representation, so it is not safe to cache the output of this directly. Instead, cache the result of @B_com#google#android#gms#common#data#Freezable#freeze_E@.

Returns: The formatted number of increments this user has made to this event.
getFormattedValue().Description: Retrieves the sum of increments have been made to this event (formatted for the user's locale).

Returns: The number of increments this user has made to this event.
getValue().Description: Retrieves the number of increments this user has made to this event.

Parameters: The buffer to load the data into.
getName(android.database.CharArrayBuffer.Description: Loads the event name into the given @B_android#database#CharArrayBuffer_E@.

getEventId().Description: Retrieves the ID of this event.

getDescription().Description: Retrieves the description for this event.

Parameters: The buffer to load the data into.
getFormattedValue(android.database.CharA.Description: Retrieves the sum of increments have been made to this event (formatted for the user's locale).

Returns: Whether to display the event to the user.
isVisible().Description: Retrieves whether the event should be displayed to the user in any event related UIs.

Returns: The image URI for the achievement's unlocked image icon, or null if the achievement has no unlocked image.
getIconImageUri().Description: Retrieves a URI that can be used to load the event's image icon. Returns null if the event has no image. To retrieve the Image from the @B_android#net#Uri_E@, use @B_com#google#android#gms#common#images#ImageManager_E@.

Parameters: The buffer to load the data into.
getDescription(android.database.CharArra.Description: Loads the event description into the given @B_android#database#CharArrayBuffer_E@.

ClassDesc: Data interface for retrieving event information.
